Body: I am interested in installing Android 6.0 on my device Huawei Honor 7 (PLK-L01).At this point in time, the device name is not listed in the Android website as a supported device. Would i still be able to install it?I am really interested to understand the reasons why a certain Android-based device can't support the latest version of Android OS.Thank you for reading my questions. Any help or explanation would be greatly appreciated.
Title: How to install Android 6.0 If the device is not listed yet?

history.Text: I am interested in installing **Android 6.0** on my device **Huawei Honor 7 (PLK-L01)**.At this point in time, the device name is not listed in the Android website as a supported device. Would i still be able to install it?I am really interested to understand the reasons why a certain Android-based device can't support the latest version of Android OS.Thank you for reading my questions. Any help or explanation would be greatly appreciated.
How to install Android 6.0 If the device is not listed yet?
